transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. I can take you to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🏫 Many kids ride me every day.
🛑 I have a big yellow sign that pops out
👨‍✈️ A driver helps me move.

transport.question: I float on water and can carry lots of people or things. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need the ocean or a lake.
🚢 I am bigger than a rowboat.
⚓ I have a horn that goes 'toot toot!'

transport.question: I have two wheels, and you use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: ⛑️ You might wear a helmet when using me.
🚲 I have pedals that you push with your feet.
🔔 I might have a bell to ding.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
🛬 You can find me at an airport
✈️ I have wings, but they don't flap.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and can carry many passengers across long distances. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special path.
🚂 I make a 'choo-choo' sound.
⏱️ People use me to travel between cities.

transport.question: I can take you to space! What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me.
🔥 I use a lot of fuel to go very, very far.
🪐 I leave Earth's atmosphere.

transport.question: I am a car that you can wave down in the street. What am I?

hints.text: 🚕 I am often yellow in color.
🚖 I have a sign on my roof.
🛣️ I take you where you need to go for a fee.

transport.question: I am a vehicle with a siren that helps people who are sick or hurt. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I make a loud 'wee-ooh' sound.
🏥 I rush to the hospital.
🚑 I have a bed inside for patients.

transport.question: I fly in the sky, but I have spinning blades on top instead of wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one spot.
🗻 I can land on a building
🛩️ My spinning blades help me fly.

transport.question: I travel underwater and can carry people deep into the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 Fish swim all around me.
⚓ I can dive very deep.
🌊 I have windows so people can see the sea life.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange, sometimes purple or yellow too!
🐇 I grow under the ground.
🥗 You can eat me raw or cooked.

plant.question: I have a trunk and leaves, and birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am very tall.
🍃 I give shade on a sunny day.
🦉 Squirrels like to live in me too.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌺 I grow on a stem.
🐝 I need the sun to grow.
💐 People give me as gifts.

plant.question: I am long and green, and you can eat me in a salad. I am a type of lettuce.

hints.text: 🥬 I am crunchy
🥗 You can put dressing on me.
🐢 Turtles like to eat me too.

plant.question: I am a big, round fruit that grows on a vine. I am red inside and have black seeds.

hints.text: 🍉 I am a popular summer snack.
🌱 I need lots of sun and water to grow.
⛱️ I am very juicy.

plant.question: I have prickly thorns and beautiful flowers. People often grow me in gardens.

hints.text: 🌹 I come in many different colors like red, pink, and yellow.
🥀 I can be used to make perfume.
🧤 Be careful when you touch me!

plant.question: I grow tall and have yellow kernels covered in silk. You can eat me on the cob.

hints.text: 🌽 Animals and people eat me.
👨‍🌾 Farmers grow me in fields.
🍿 You can make popcorn from me.

plant.question: I am a dried plant part that grows into a plant. I am often brown or green and can be cooked in soup.

hints.text: 🥣 I am small and round.
🌱 I need water to sprout.
🍲 I am a type of legume.

plant.question: I am a long, thin vegetable that grows on a vine and has a bumpy skin. You can make pickles out of me.

hints.text: 🥒 I am crunchy and green.
🫙 I am preserved in vinegar to make pickles.
🪴 I have small prickly bumps on my skin.

plant.question: I am a small, leafy green plant that grows close to the ground. Some people put me in their gardens to walk on.

hints.text: 🍀 I am soft and green.
⚽ You can play on me.
🏡 Some people like to walk barefoot on me.
